DOC.brief_summary: Long-Term Safety Of PF-00345439 ( Oxycodone ) In Patients With Moderate To Severe Chronic Low Back Pain Or Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate : ( ) long-term safety PTI-821 12-month period ; ( b ) long-term efficacy PTI-821 assess pain intensity ( PI ) , quality analgesia , global assessment study medication .
DOC.criteria: Males female ≥ 18 ≤ 75 year age moderate severe pain one hip knee joint ( ) cause osteoarthritis least three month prior Baseline Visit persistent moderate severe low back pain least six month regularly take one follow type oral analgesic medication ( ) prior Baseline Visit . Patient agree refrain take opioid medication study drug study period . Patients must agree report nonopioid analgesic medication take . Females postmenopausal , physically incapable childbearing , practice acceptable method birth control . Acceptable method birth control include surgical sterilization , hormonal contraceptive , doublebarrier method ( condom diaphragm spermicidal agent IUD ) . If practice acceptable method birth control , negative urine pregnancy test result obtain Baseline Visit . Patient positive urine drug screen Baseline Visit . Patient currently opioid regimen daily opioid dose equivalent oxycodone > 160 mg . Patient major surgery plan propose study period .
